author: Special Correspondent
text:
A man wearing a helmet barged into a house on Naval Hospital Road in Vepery and snatched the chain of a 58-year-old woman after injuring her, on Tuesday afternoon.

According to the police, Parimala was sleeping in her house around 3.30 p.m. She had left the door open when the thief, whose identity remains unknown, entered.

He snatched her chain and inflicted an injury on her neck.The police have registered a case and are investigating.

Chain snatched

Two persons on a motorcycle snatched the chain of a 64-year-old woman after chasing her down in Gerugambakkam on Monday evening.

According to the police, Sokkamal, whose chain was snatched, sustained injuries when she resisted the duo. The police are investigating.
title: Man barges into house, snatches woman’s chain
